name: Eatables
description:
Title: Eatables

You've been bitten outside of a grocery store and you have limited time to eat as many people as you can before you decompose.

WASD - Move

This was a quick game developed all "in-house" for the 10 day long GameDev.tv 2022 Game Jam. The theme was "Death is Only The Beginning". It was our first game jam and we enjoyed developing the prototype. Enjoy and leave us some comments. As of the first upload of the game, there are multiple animations that aren't finished, audio SFX that haven't been implemented and there may be some minor non-game-breaking bugs.

Team:

  • Programmed By: Dave Evans
  • Art By: Chris Nace & Dave Evans
  • SFX By: Keith Chalkey & Dave Evans
  • Music By: Daniel Guerrera
